"Group Chat":
"A Group Chat is a communication function that creates an invite-only chat for up to 100 people.

To greate a Group Chat, select \"Chat\" from the Main Menu, then select \"Group Chat Settings\" and choose people to invite."

"In addition to your own Group Chat, you can join up to five others by being invited to them.

Group Chats record everything said while you were logged out, so you can catch up on the conversation when you log back in."
